sentences.sContent: Ruth Hilton, an orphaned seamstress, is seduced and then abandoned by Henry Bellingham, a young squire.
sentences.sCn: 露丝·希尔顿是个孤独的裁缝，她被年轻乡绅亨利·贝宁汉引诱后又被放弃。

synos.tran: 乡绅；侍从；大地主；地方法官

trans.tranOther: the man who in the past owned most of the land around a country village in England
